dict.acceptation: 活动；活跃，敏捷；活动力；教育活动；

sent.orig: To accomplish this, your Activity should start a Service in which the upload takes place.
sent.trans: 要做到这一点，Activity应该启动一个Service处理上传工作。

sent.orig: This thesis is about the combination of customer value and activity-based management (ABM).
sent.trans: 本论文的论题是顾客价值与作业管理的结合，也即以顾客价值为导向，实施对企业的基础构成——作业(Activity)的管理。

sent.orig: Progress is the activity of today and the assurance of tomorrow.
sent.trans: 进步是今天的活动和明天的保证。

sent.orig: Through-vitro pharmacological activity tests, the sugar acid compound has PTP-1B inhibition activity and good anti-tumor activity.
sent.trans: 经体外药理活性测试，其具有PTP-1B抑制活性和很好的抗肿瘤活性。

sent.orig: In the activity-on-arrow network, there are essential differences between positive activity and dummy activity.
sent.trans: 在双代号网络图中，虚工作和实工作有着本质的区别，其主要作用是传递工作之间的逻辑关系。
